general_advisory: In case of shortage of water, go for alternative row irrigation method for better utilization of water which saves around 50% water. Also the drip irrigation system in Orchard saves water. Sprinkling irrigation method reduces the effect of high temperature.

advisory: Due to rise in temperature, the BPH attack may be seen, to manage this, make alleys in every meter gap for effective sunlight at the base of the plant, chemically spray in case of above ETL Thiomethoxam @ 3 g per 15 liters of water.
Leaf folder may attack, go for spraying Lambdacyalothrin @ 1ml per liter of water.
Due to weather survey the infestation of YMV disease and to manage this apply Ridomil MZ @ 2g/liter of water. Provide irrigation at flowering stage.
Provide irrigation due to rise in temperature at pod development stage.
For good seed filling, apply 2-3 g of Borax/liter of water. Early sown crop.
